medical_history.chief_complaint: Low abdominal pain for several days.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient experienced low-grade abdominal pain for approximately 2 weeks, which became intolerable in the last few days. Symptoms persisted leading to his ED visit.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Coronary artery disease status post LAD stent. 2. Hypertension. 3. History of internal hemorrhoids. 4. Barrett's esophagus.
medical_history.family_history: Father had heart disease; mother had brain cancer. No history of colon cancer or inflammatory bowel disease.
